title: Devilled chicken drumsticks
ingredients: ['8 large chicken drumsticks', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 fresh green chilli, seeded and finely chopped or', '1/2 tsp chilli powder', '1/4 tsp ground ginger', '3 tbsp runny honey', '3 tbsp dark muscovado sugar', '4 tbsp tomato ketchup', '2 tbsp dry sherry or 1 tbsp sherry or white wine vinegar', '2 tbsp soy sauce', '1 tbsp Dijon mustard', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
